buildings.name: Observatory
buildings.description: Study the stars and gather celestial materials. Astrologists craft blessings and wards from stardust.

tiers.flavorText: Slaying enemies amplifies your arcane might.
Slaying enemies floods you with cosmic energy.
Slaying enemies channels a thousand stars.
The entire cosmos celebrates your victories.
Perfect strikes draw power from the cosmos.
Silver moonbeams restore vitality when struck.
Celestial radiance mends wounds when struck.
The full moon's blessing heals when struck.
The stars condemn your foes to vulnerability.
Channel raw cosmic energy into attacks.
The weight of planets crushes your foes.
Wield the destructive force of supernovas.
The stars intervene to prevent your demise.
Refined starlight pulls you back from death.
Immaculate cosmic energy denies death itself.
